name: WebriQ Europe
tag_list: free-websites-online, create-a-website-online, online-website-builder, dynamic-portal-engine, online-content-management-system, interactive-web-2-o-websites, webtool-for-user-generated-content
overview:
WEBRIQ is a free online service that provides anyone the possibility to build AJAX driven websites without having programming knowledge. The user must just select the website template and provide the sign-up personal details, then by logging into the account the content of the website will be added from a web browser based interface, also AJAX based.

The template is customizable and in the same time, it can be changed with another one by selecting the Design menu entry that appear on a bar at the top of the web page. The web site building takes place in a visual manner: any modification performed over the navigation system or content is instantly reflected in the web browser.

The website navigation menu is created automatically, based on the new pages added. For example, a new page can be created by dragging and dropping the corresponding icon to the menu root icon, and its name will be displayed as a new menu entry.

In the same manner other website elements could be defined such as RSS feeds, contact forms, blogs, video galleries and more. The web pages content is easy to add or edit with a simple to use WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) editor. Tools for managing and publishing of multilingual content are also available.

The generated XHTML and CSS code is W3C valid and as a consequence, the website will be successfully rendered by any modern web browser. Practically, the WEBRIQ web service allows the creation of simple or complex AJAX powered websites like news portals, online stores, company presentation websites and other.

The service is suitable to be used by both beginners, as well as advanced webmasters because its simplicity, website development time reduction, website customization options and the high number of features that can be implemented automatically in any web page.
